meta.description: The standard terminal emulator of LXDE

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v2.0 only

meta.long_description:
LXTerminal is the standard terminal emulator of LXDE. The terminal is a
desktop-independent VTE-based terminal emulator for LXDE without any
unnecessary dependencies.
meta.name: lxterminal
